parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
The name of the collection.

> You can call the [ListCollections](~~2401503~~) operation to query a list of collections.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the index creation job, which is returned from the `CreateIndex` operation.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace name.

> You can call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: NamespacePassword
parameters.description:
The password for the namespace.

> The value of this parameter is specified by the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the available region list.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. You must specify one of the WorkspaceId and DBInstanceId parameters. If you specify both parameters, the WorkspaceId parameter takes precedence.

Valid values:

*   ip
*   l2
*   cosine
